entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
